title: Back Stage at a Metaverse Concert
description:
Pop star Tai Verdes is the latest among a slew of stars performing concerts in the metaverse, a virtual world growing in popularity. Verdes and WSJ's Anne Steele explain why the music industry is diving in.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
